website_summaries.verdict: When looking good is as important as keeping the drink cold, this gel freezer mug comes through with flying colors.
pros: Can choose from orange, green, pink, or blue
Crackled glass appearance dresses up parties
Tall glass holds up to 16 oz
Will keep drinks cold up to an hour after putting in freezer for 2-4 hours
cons: May want to clean with a bottle brush because of the narrow bottom
Should be washed by hand and not in dishwasher

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: First off these are NOT 16oz mugs. They barely hold a 12oz beer and if it foams up, which it will, it will not hold a 12oz beer. They don't cool evenly as there are gaps in the stuff between the layers. Amazon should remove these mugs from their store. They are not as advertised. I wished there was a negative rating to give these...it would be a -10
customer_reviews.author: Lab Rat

customer_reviews.title: Don't Buy
customer_reviews.text: False Advertising The cup is not 16oz, I use it for cans of monsters that are 16oz and they leave a decent amount in the bottom of the can. The cup worked great the first couple weeks but now the gel is deteriorating and has about 80% remaining.
customer_reviews.author: Allaway0

customer_reviews.title: Looks like a high-class glass
customer_reviews.text: It is beautiful with the cracked marble appearance of the double wall gel the drinks look beautiful in it It doesn't keep it as cold for as long as I'd like but it does keep it cold for a while about half an hour
customer_reviews.author: Anna Manning

customer_reviews.title: Great freezer stein
customer_reviews.text: I love my beers very cold. It is a very good looking glass and freezes very fast. It is tall beer stein look you need to find the right place in your freezer to store it. The gel is solid does not look that will have a problem with the cheaper version that is liquid and they leak.
customer_reviews.author: Sonja B

customer_reviews.title: Keeps beverage icy cold
customer_reviews.text: Keeps my beverage icy cold for over an hour. I clean it with a bottle brush due to its narrow bottom. Love this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: they freeze well and are cold for drinks.
customer_reviews.text: This is great! I bought 2 of these. My husband and I drink out of them on really hot days .We put them in the freezer then pull them out later to use.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen tripp

customer_reviews.title: Works Great.
customer_reviews.text: This cup does get your beer really cold. It does get warm after the 2nd beer. But that first one will have ice crystals in it. Works really well.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: DOESN'T STAY COLD
customer_reviews.text: You can only drink one beverage before needing to replace the glass because it doesn't stay cold. Very Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M

customer_reviews.title: Freezer ... drinks wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: The glass is made great once frozen keeps the drink cold for a substantial amount of time, the colors of the glass are great ! Great product! Bought every color!
customer_reviews.author: BARBARA ZERLES

customer_reviews.title: Large patches of the gel missing from the glass.
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality product- the gel did not cover the entire glass. There were large patches missing the gel. Obviously, without the gel covering the entire glass, it doesn’t keep liquids cold.
customer_reviews.author: Gary B.

customer_reviews.title: Need more gel inside
customer_reviews.text: My cup freeze uneven due to not enough gel inside, I placed warm water inside to try and spread the gel evenly, but is not always successful.
customer_reviews.author: Andre Davis

customer_reviews.title: Avoid.
customer_reviews.text: The mug lasted three days and the bottom fell out and all the gel spilled out. Avoid this item, it is useless.
customer_reviews.author: Oliver Felton

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I did order the product in pink color and arrives purple. The material is not glass But is 👍
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good cold cup, needs better design.
customer_reviews.text: Works great, but both cups ended up cracking within 2 months of use. Was still able to use them for a while . But don't last that long. Great cup for keeping your beverage cold for a long time, just breaks easily. Needs thicker plastic wall.
customer_reviews.author: Curtis "Bear"

customer_reviews.title: Great for the camper
customer_reviews.text: Got these for the camper freezer. We hardly use any ice because these glasses keep our drinks so cold. Bought 2 and then bought 2 more.
customer_reviews.author: Gary W.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent slushes!
customer_reviews.text: I keep it in the freezer so it's ready to deliver that great slushy cola! Wonderful to have on a summer day!
customer_reviews.author: Lucky Louise

customer_reviews.title: Ok mugs
customer_reviews.text: They are so tall they don’t fit standing up in the freezer
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift for my brother in law and he likes it a lot!
customer_reviews.author: evossstein

product_meta.title: Mug Double Wall Gel Freezer Mug 16 oz Insulated Freezer Pilsner Mug Beer Glass with Freezing Gel (Pink)
feature_bullets: Highest Quality Insulated Tall Beer Mug
Mug Contains Freezer Gel to Keep Your Drink Cold for Hours
These acrylic mugs can cool your beverage while will be no harmful for your health.
Double wall design, ice looking item inside, fashionable and pretty
